attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pull The Trigger Recieve the bullet!
This is A REAL way to stop GUN & KNIFE CRIME.
We belive that it will deter many people from carrying knives and guns and actually commiting murder in cold blood, if they knew the consequence that they faced would be death.
As far as we are concerned if you take somebodys life then its only fair yours is taken.
Some may argue that it is not right to kill these murderers. The facts is we do not sentece these people to murder.. they do that themselves.
Those who argue must be harbouring Murders seeing as they are eager to protect these people.
In some cases there would be exceptions be it medical or whatever.
But in All other Cases Murderers should recive the Death penalty.
Excuse my Poor spelling & Grammar =]

rejection.details: A similar petition already exists at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/DeathPenalty2007/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
